text:
Intradural herniation of a thoracic disc presenting as flaccid paraplegia: case report.
 A case of intradural herniation of a thoracic disc in a patient with a flaccid paraplegia is described.
 Intradural herniation of a thoracic disc is considered a rare event.
 A review of the relevant patient literature revealed 14 other reports involving 28 patients.
 No other report has described a patient with an intradural thoracic disc herniation who developed a flaccid paraplegia.
